lan.wi.ma. thula sthapitha karagath nithi wirodhi watup thalayata nilabhawaya nodena lesath, sewaka prasada dimana, waidya dimana ha athikala dimana kappaduwakin thorawa gewana lesath illa lan.wi.ma. eekabaddha wruththiya samithi sandhanaya eeye (11da) dinaye akhanda upawasayakata lan.wi.ma. mulasthanaya idiripitadi awathirna wu athara ada (12da) rata pura siyalu widuli wadabimwala sewakayan rajakariwalin iwath wi wadabimhi randi sitina bawath ohu pawasuweya.

batahira sahaya, aayojanaya ho alma balma nathiwa ratak sanwardhanaya kala nohakiya….!…meya apa muhuna diya yuthu parama yatharthayayi….batahira lokaya samaga hathurukam athikaragena, owunta nirdhaya lesa bana wadimin, deshapalanikawa saha aarthikawa owungen aath wana wita rataka mona tharam pahasukam, samaya, aayojana awastha thibunath waguthuwak wanne natha….mudalali madakalapu saramak adagena, hamine lassanata redda hatte adagena, duwata mal gawumak anda puyara ula, kade kunu podak nohitinna athugala, badu tika nit ekata thiyala, kattiya wadiwela bala sitithi….badu ganna kawuruth enne natha….ena eka denna enneth “pothata badu aragena” yannaya…game kraya shakthiya sathu pawul samaga hith amanapa kam hadagena nisa un kade palathe enne natha…apita badu wikunanna thiyenne unta witharak unata, unta badu ganna thiyenne me kade pamanak nowe…un supurudu kadawalata yathi…ee kadawaladi unta mithrashiliwa salakayi….kotinma une ochcharaya…
